General.Name: Reyna Silver Corp
General.Description: Reyna Silver Corp. operates as a silver exploration company in Mexico and the United States. The company explores in silver and gold properties. Its flagship property includes 100% owned Guigui Property, which consists of 7 concessions covering an area of 4,553.7034 hectares located in Chihuahua, Mexico. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 2900-595 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1J5

3.Name: Mr. Ariel G. Navarro Herrera M.Sc.
3.Title: VP of Exploration
